channel.title: Dictation problem with markdown
channel.description:
When dictating a series of markdown unordered list items, with each line starting with "hyphen-space," subsequent lines don't start with "hyphen-space" like they do when I physically press the Return Key. It fails to do this whether I say "new line" or "new paragraph."
Can I do something to make this work?
Thanks, Russell

item.title: Dictation problem with markdown
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
That’s probably because it isn’t interactive input but instead a batched input; just like a multiline clipboard paste.

Read full topic

item.title: Dictation problem with markdown
item.dc:creator: rbanks88
item.description:
Thanks. I was able to make that work. I noticed the same problem with several other markdown editors. They don’t see dictated newlines and returns the same as a keyboard tap.

Read full topic

item.title: Dictation problem with markdown
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
Check out this thread.

Making a task list with your voice
When you’re making a task list with your voice what do you say at the end of that task to get a new task field to be able To continue entering tasked with your voice versus having to go up to the keypad. When you say new line The next line does not include the task brackets

Read full topic
